reviews.text: Stayed overnight as most other hotels were full. The reception was cold (and it's not the temperature I'm talking about).The staff looked botox-ed.
reviews.title: Nightmare on Cavenaugh Road

reviews.text: Room was musty as if it hadn't been aired in ages; the bathroom stank. No hot water in the tapsThe mattress was covered with hair!! Could hardly sleep --was so nauseous the whole night.
reviews.title: Don't even consider staying here!
WON'T NEVER GO THERE AGAIN
reviews.text: Wished I had simply stretched out on the airport floor instead !!

reviews.title: Super Bad Hotel
reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights back in 2003. Our travel agent informed us that it was in a very good location and US$20 cheaper than Crown Prince Hotel and he would recommend we stay there. Boy were we every wrong for listening to his advice! The lobby was enough to scare us as soon as we entered. It was dark and old and the staff were not helpful at all. The rooms were downright appaling and had a musty smell that wouldn't go away! The beds were crappy, the walls were dirty, the bathroom was gross and moldy, the tv didn't even have its own stand (it was ON the mini bar ref)! The airconditioning was awful and we had to switch rooms twice before ending up in an "acceptable" cooler room. After a night in this hotel we were pretty much ready to cry and self-pity was definitely setting in. We later found out that the hotel was quite known for being a brothel! No wonder I was sent away from the "spa" place upstairs by the "mama-san" (pimp) saying that it was for MEN ONLY! Don't ever stay here!!!
It's the worst i ever had. Even though i ever go for the cheapest hotel, the service, the reception counter,the front desk counter, the room was not worst like this.
reviews.title: DONT EVER GO THERE!!

reviews.text: Dirty Room. Very thin wall and can hear TV from next door.
reviews.title: Terrible

reviews.text: Avoid this hotel if you can.
reviews.title: What you pay for is what you get

likes.liked: — Central location in the shopping district

reviews.text: It's a very simple hotel! Rooms are poor and you should not be surprised if you have to take a shower in cold water. Breakfast is really poor. However, the hotel is VERY central if you plan to shop at Orchard road. The rates are low and you get what you pay for.
reviews.title: Uniquely Singapore???
Please save your money
reviews.text: The Hotel Staff is really UNIQUELY RUDE! I thought I was paticulary fussy, but after reading the reviews, looks as if a lot more other have the same views & experience. Super Rude Reception Staff..Save your money folks!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's sad to have Singapore Tourism Board spend truck loads of money for their Uniquely Singapore campaign & to have Tourism Frontliners who'd try so hard to be Rude, Cold & totally unhelpful towards guests.
reviews.title: hated grand central

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked this hotel expecting a bit of luxury at the end of a four week holiday to Asia and was bitterly disappointed. The only good point is its location, everything else is bad.
reviews.title: Sordid hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. Reception. Rude, unhelpful, cold.
reviews.title: Will not return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2. Rooms. Untouched since the hotel was built. Therefore, carpets are stained, tiles are mouldy and chipped and electrical appliancies don't tend to work.
reviews.title: The "pits"

reviews.text: 3. Breakfast. Probably the worst I have had. Cold, stale, unimaginative and the dining room consisted of large communal tables with plastic table cloths. All plates are, of course, plastic and the nasty grease-leaden plastic flowers which simply adds to the sordid atmosphere of a sordid hotel.
reviews.title: Very basic hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thankfully I was only there for one night. Don't even think about going there!
reviews.title: Awful, Awful, Awful

reviews.text: I stayed in Grand Central last month as all the hotels in Singpaore are fully booked. and I thank god that I stayed for only a night. To be fair, its price is fair @ USD90 ++ and locationwise very central. The check in was slow, very manual and like some old European hotels, they still use metal keys for opening the room door. It's a very old hotel and I wonder if it ever was renovated ever since it opened its door to business.
reviews.title: Old and weary hotel

likes.disliked: — Unprofessinal staff, the thin walls, the bed.

reviews.text: The room is clean actually, wall's thin (the guest next door was blaring on his cell phone) and there's no complimentary mineral water given, you have to boil your own water from the tap. Of course, the infamous breakfast, I was done in 10 minutes and didn't want to stay there one more moment. Eggs, fried noodles, toast with some cheap jam served in what seemed like a ballroom with big Chinese restaurant style tables.
reviews.title: Worst Breakfast And Rude Frontdesk/Concierge

reviews.text: Location was its saving grace, for that kind of price and still be centrally located, I guess I should not complain, but will I return?
reviews.title: Affirming Previous Reviews

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Never.
reviews.title: nightmare

reviews.text: Stayed in Grand Central for 3 days, arrived late bout 2pm n my room are not ready!! front desk told me to come back in 2hours time..could you imagine travelling from airport struggle in the jammed and they ask you to wait for another 2hours!!..then i ask the concierge old man white hair, if i can put my lugg to store, he said to me ..'fren why not you bring your bag to your room n just put it there(room not ready)..then i told him bout my room not ready, then he say..' hello fren are you telling me that your bags will be stolen in the room!..how can he say this to a guest..the breakfast is the same every day and the same for the past 7months..fried noodles,boil egg,slice cucumber/tomato,sausages,poridge,bread and orange juice white in colour as you push the button of the machine..CRAZY!!.the only good things i can say good about this hotel is the location...
reviews.title: Absolutely awful
